<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow>
    <mo>{</mo>
    <mtable columnalign="right center left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>3</mn>
            <mi>x</mi>
            <mo>+</mo>
            <mi>y</mi>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>=</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mn>3</mn>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>2</mn>
            <mi>x</mi>
            <mo>+</mo>
            <mn>3</mn>
            <mi>y</mi>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>=</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>5</mn>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
    </mtable>
    <mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left\{ \begin{array}{rcl}{3x + y}&{ = }&{ - 3 }\\{2x + 3y}&{ = }&{5 }\end{array}  \right.</annotation></semantics></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow>
    <mo>{</mo>
    <mtable columnalign="right center left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mi>y</mi>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>=</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mfrac>
              <mn>3</mn>
              <mn>2</mn>
            </mfrac>
            <mi>x</mi>
            <mo>+</mo>
            <mn>1</mn>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mi>y</mi>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>=</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mfrac>
              <mn>1</mn>
              <mn>2</mn>
            </mfrac>
            <mi>x</mi>
            <mo>+</mo>
            <mn>5</mn>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
    </mtable>
    <mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left\{ \begin{array}{rcl}{y}&{ = }&{\frac{3}{2}x + 1 }\\{y}&{ = }&{ - \frac{1}{2}x + 5 }\end{array}  \right.</annotation></semantics></math>

            <mn>3</mn>
            <mi>y</mi>

        <mtd>

</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left\{ \begin{array}{rcl}{x + 3y}&{ = }&{ - 6 }\\{y}&{ = }&{ - \frac{4}{3}x + 4 }\end{array}  \right.</annotation></semantics></math>
